topics.title: Laravel Airlock - Authentication system for SPAs and simple APIs
topics.summary: Laravel Airlock provides a featherweight authentication system for SPAs and simple APIs.
topics.speaker: Vikash Pathak

topics.title: ABC of API Development With Laravel
topics.speaker: Jasmel Singh

topics.title: Multi Tenant Application Architectures
topics.summary: Different Architectures available for creating multi-tenant application. How Laravel supports these architectures?
topics.speaker: Ankit Kumar

topics.title: Multi Tenant Application Architectures - Practical Example with Laravel
topics.summary: Practical Example - How you can setup multi-tenant application with single / multi database.
topics.speaker: Vikash Pathak

topics.title: Code Smartly: Tips, Tricks & Good Practices in Laravel
topics.summary: Everyone could code and achieve the functionality in their efficient way but it's always have a concern the code you have written is in effective way. Talk consists tips, tricks and good practices in Laravel that can decrease your coding hours in effective ways.
topics.speaker: Vikash Pathak

topics.title: OAuth2 with Laravel Passport
topics.summary: OAuth2 : What is it? Its related terminology. How is it implemented in Laravel? Creating different Clients in Passport and their Authentication
topics.speaker: Harpreet Singh

topics.title: Let's debug with Laravel Telescope
topics.summary: Laravel Telescope is an elegant debug assistant for the Laravel framework. Telescope provides insight into the requests coming into your application, exceptions, log entries, database queries, queued jobs, mail, notifications, cache operations, scheduled tasks, variable dumps and more. Telescope makes a wonderful companion to your local Laravel development environment.
topics.description: Laravel Telescope is an elegant debug assistant for the Laravel framework. Telescope provides insight into the requests coming into your application, exceptions, log entries, database queries, queued jobs, mail, notifications, cache operations, scheduled tasks, variable dumps and more. Telescope makes a wonderful companion to your local Laravel development environment.
topics.speaker: Vikash Pathak

topics.title: Uses of Observers in Laravel
topics.summary: Observers are used to group event listeners for a model. Observers classes method names refer to the Eloquent event you want to listen for. These methods receive the model as their only argument. Laravel does not include a default directory for observers.
topics.description: Observers are used to group event listeners for a model. Observers classes method names refer to the Eloquent event you want to listen for. These methods receive the model as their only argument. Laravel does not include a default directory for observers.
topics.speaker: Lakhwinder Singh

topics.title: Redis - Data Structure Server
topics.summary: Redis is an open source, advanced key-value store. It is often referred to as a data structure server since keys can contain strings, hashes, lists, sets, and sorted sets. Before using Redis with Laravel, you will need to install the predis/predis package (~1.0) via Composer.
topics.description: Redis is an open source, advanced key-value store. It is often referred to as a data structure server since keys can contain strings, hashes, lists, sets, and sorted sets. Before using Redis with Laravel, you will need to install the predis/predis package (~1.0) via Composer.
topics.speaker: Jaswinder Singh

topics.title: Pivot Tables - Techniques and Readability
topics.summary: Uncover hidden pivot related features which generally gets ignored. Keep code readable - Intent driven naming for pivot tables.
topics.description: Uncover hidden pivot related features which generally gets ignored. Keep code readable - Intent driven naming for pivot tables.
